= Splunk HEC
:cq-artifact-id: camel-quarkus-splunk-hec
:cq-native-supported: false

The splunk component allows to publish events in Splunk using the HTTP Event Collector.

== What's inside

* xref:latest@components::splunk-hec-component.adoc[Splunk HEC component], URI syntax: `splunk-hec:splunkURL/token`

Please refer to the above link for usage and configuration details.

== Maven coordinates

[source,xml]
----
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.camel.quarkus</groupId>
    <artifactId>camel-quarkus-splunk-hec</artifactId>
</dependency>
